messages.title: My Priorities for Rutherglen & Hamilton West
content: Oppose the SNP's plans for another independence referendum.
Secure Rutherglen and Hamilton West's share of the £1.13 billion investment in the Glasgow City Region deal.
Ensure Health Services are kept local with good access for all.
Support our local town centres and small businesses. High Streets need more investment for the people that use them.
Secure more investment in local roads and transport links, especially in areas with growth in residential development.

Labour and the Lib Dems are now too weak to stand up to the SNP
